1.title: Junior JavaScript developer
1.job_description:
[
We are actively developing IT company that provides a wide range of high-quality products, solutions and services in the field of information technology.Now we are looking forjunior JavaScript developer !If you are smart, if you want to work and study new technologies, send you CV and get the opportunity to join our team!What do we expect from you:
real practical experience in JavaScript (it can be non-commercial experience, but you should have at least minimal JS coding experience)
good knowledge of HTML and CSS
any of JavaScript frameworks knowledge would great
Pre-Intermediate level of English
We suggest working as a Developer on current projects and participate in code review and tasks planning activitiesWhat we provide:
flexible working schedule
highly competitive salary
free English classes;
Vacation, paid sick leaves, insurance, gym;
opportunity to improve your knowledge of web-development
You can work remotely or work in our comfortable office .Waiting for your CV!
Показати телефон
]
